author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: No, the Christian order is Christ -> everyone else, not this pagan nuclear family ideal that has never even been achieved. I don't care what the church fathers wrote under Paul's and Peter's names, heck I don't care if Paul and Peter did really say that because they'd be wrong anyway (but it's pretty obvious it wasn't them). Look in the gospels. Jesus said to be as little children. Countless stories of people being told to leave their biological family behind for the spiritual brotherhood, in which there are to be no divisions, not Jew or Greek, not slave or free, not male and female. Being a eunuch called greater than marriage. I know it's tempting to think that if we could just return to some grand ideal like this one, all the major problems in the world would be instantly solved. But that's not how it works, and life in this world is just rotten regardless and considered broken and temporary. Trying to strive and "fix society" like worldly people do is a vain effort and only creates more problems than it solves.

Trying to strive and "fix society" like worldly people do is a vain effort and only creates more problems than it solves.
